alert.note: Alert for Lower Washington County; South Central Utah; Southern Mountains; Zion National Park (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 23 at 5:18PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Washington County through 600 PM MDT... At 517 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Sand Hollow State Park, or 22 miles southwest of Zion National Park, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Washington, Hurricane, La Verkin, Sand Hollow State Park, Quail Creek State Park, Toquerville, Leeds, Virgin and Pintura. This includes Interstate 15 between mile markers 13 and 33. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Lower Washington County; South Central Utah; Southern Mountains; Zion National Park
